gurmukhi: ਅਵਘਟਿ ੳੁਤਰਿ ਸਰੋਵਰਿ ਮਜਨੁ ਕਰੈ ਜਪਤ ਅਜਪਾ ਜਾਪੁ ਅਨਭੈ ਅਭਿਅਾਸੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Avaghati Outari Sarovari Majanu Karai , Japat Ajapaa Jaapu Anabhai Abhiaasee Hai ?
translation: Crossing the difficult discipline of the Yogi; a Guru-oriented person bathes himself in the mystical tenth door of the spiritual realm. He dwells in the elixir-like Naam and becomes practitioner of fearless Lord.

gurmukhi: ਨਿਝਰ ਅਪਾਰ ਧਾਰ ਬਰਖਾ ਅਕਾਸ ਬਾਸ ਜਗਮਗ ਜੋਤਿ ਅਨਹਦ ਅਬਿਨਾਸੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Nijhar Apaar Dhaar Barakhaa Akaas Baasa , Jagamag Joti Anahad Abinaasee Hai ?
translation: He experiences a continuous flow of the celestial nectar in the mystical tenth opening. He experiences light divine and continuous playing of celestial unstruck melody.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਤਮ ਅਵੇਸ ਪਰਮਾਤਮ ਪ੍ਵੇਸ ਕੈ ਅਧਯਾਤਮ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਰਿਧਿ ਸਿਧਿ ਨਿਧਿ ਦਾਸੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Aatam Avays Paramaatam Pravays Kai , Adhayaatam Giaan Ridhi Sidhi Nidhi Daasee Hai ?
translation: A Guru-oriented person settles in self and gets absorbed in the Lord God. By virtue of his spiritual knowledge all the miraculous powers now become his slaves.

gurmukhi: ਜੀਵਨ ਮੁਕਤਿ ਜਗਜੀਵਨ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਜਾਨੀ ਸਲਿਲ ਕਮਲ ਗਤਿ ਮਾੲਿਅਾ ਮੈ ੳੁਦਾਸੀ ਹੈ ||੨੪੮||
transliteration: Jeevan Moukati Jagajeevan Jougati Jaanee , Salil Kamal Gati Maaiaa Mai Udaasee Hai ?248?
translation: One, who, in this life has learnt the means of reaching the Lord is liberated while still alive. He remains unaffected by worldly matters (maya), like a lotus flower that lives in water and is not affected by it. (248)
